fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Lullaby of Protection: The Dreamweaver sings a soothing lullaby, protecting a target player from any harmful actions for one night. This ability can be used once every two nights.
- Dreamscape Manipulation: The Dreamweaver taps into the ethereal realm of dreams, altering the dreams of one player each night. The target's actions and abilities will be temporarily modified according to the Dreamweaver's choice. This ability can be used every night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Resilient Spirit: The Dreamweaver possesses an indomitable spirit, making them immune to any negative effects caused by mental illnesses or psychological manipulation.
- Astral Projection: Once per game, the Dreamweaver can project their consciousness into the astral plane, becoming invulnerable to all physical and harmful attacks for one night. During this time, they can observe all night actions but cannot perform any actions themselves.
- Nightmarish Vigilance: The Dreamweaver has keen perception during the night, allowing them to detect any malicious or suspicious presence targeting players within the town. They will receive anonymous hints about the alignment of players who attempt harmful actions.
